set_cover_position.description: Moves a cover to a specific position.
set_cover_position.name: Set position

set_cover_tilt_position.description: Moves a cover tilt to a specific position.
set_cover_tilt_position.name: Set tilt position

fully_opened.description: Only trigger when the curtain is fully opened (position at 100%).
fully_opened.name: Fully opened

fully_closed.description: Only trigger when the curtain is fully closed (position at 0%).
fully_closed.name: Fully closed

curtain_stops.description: Triggers when a curtain stops moving.
curtain_stops.description_configured: Triggers when a curtain stops moving
curtain_stops.name: When a curtain stops moving

curtain_position_changed.description: Triggers when the position of a curtain changes.
curtain_position_changed.description_configured: Triggers when the position of a curtain changes

lower.description: The minimum position value to trigger on. Only triggers when position is at or above this value.
lower.name: Lower limit

upper.description: The maximum position value to trigger on. Only triggers when position is at or below this value.
upper.name: Upper limit

above.description: Only trigger when position is above this value.
above.name: Above

below.description: Only trigger when position is below this value.
below.name: Below

curtain_position_changed.name: When the position of a curtain changes
